message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. After careful consideration of its value and your potential needs, we propose a special offer of $950,000 for this exceptional item. We believe this price reflects both the quality of the product and the opportunity it presents for you. We look forward to discussing this further with you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I recognize the value of the product, but the price point is a bit high for me. I'd be willing to purchase the product for $700,000.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your interest in our product. In light of that, I would like to extend a counteroffer of $825,000 for the product. This price aims to bridge the gap between our initial proposal and your counteroffer, while still reflecting the value and quality of the product. I hope this revised offer meets your expectations and looks forward to your consideration.
I appreciate you working with me on this, Alice.  $800,000 is my limit, and I'm ready to make the purchase at that price.
